sentences.en: "It's only a sprain," Paula said brusquely.
sentences.cn: “只是扭伤了筋，”葆拉简短生硬地说。

sentences.en: Acupuncture treatments of Scapulohumeral Periarthritis and Elbow Sprain.
sentences.cn: 肩周炎、肘劳的针灸治疗方法.

sentences.en: Alessandro Costacurta a sprain in yesterday's training.
sentences.cn: 科斯塔库塔在昨天的训练中扭伤了.

sentences.en: And main types of injuries are contusion, scratch, sprain and strain.
sentences.cn: 警体运动损伤类型以挫伤 、 擦伤 、 扭伤和拉伤为主.

sentences.en: But sprain injury related to ligament and strain injury related to muscle.
sentences.cn: 但扭伤是形容韧带的受伤,拉伤是形容肌肉的受伤.

sentences.en: Crural sprain ( ligament is pulled, fracture ) how to restore quickly?
sentences.cn: 脚扭伤了 ( 韧带拉伤, 骨折 ) 怎样快速恢复?

sentences.en: Crural sprain two years, how should treat?
sentences.cn: 脚扭伤两年, 应该怎么治疗?

sentences.en: Differentiation , diagnosis and cautions of Scapulohumeral Periarthritis and Elbow Sprain.
sentences.cn: 肩周炎、肘劳的鉴别诊断、注意事项.

sentences.en: He got a foot sprain in his ankle.
sentences.cn: 他脚踝受了严重的扭伤.

sentences.en: I fell down the steps and sprained my ankle .
sentences.cn: 我从台阶上摔下来，扭伤了脚踝。

sentences.en: Injuries mainly included joint ligament sprain and muscle sprain.
sentences.cn: 损伤主要为关节韧带扭伤和肌肉拉伤.

sentences.en: It could be a simple sprain.
sentences.cn: 喝,这可能是单纯的扭伤.

sentences.en: Nick: Of course not. You can't see a sprain on an X - ray.
sentences.cn: 尼克: 当然不能. 你就是在 X 光片上也看不到扭伤啊.

sentences.en: Rubin suffered a right ankle sprain when she rolled over on her ankle.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾摔倒时身体压到了脚踝上导致右脚踝扭伤。

sentences.en: Sprain foot, very about the same, why does bone still ache?
sentences.cn: 崴了脚, 好差不多了, 为什么骨头还是疼?

sentences.en: The sprain made my ankle swell up.
sentences.cn: 我的脚踝扭伤肿了起来.

trans.tran_en: A sprain is the injury caused by spraining a joint
to damage a joint in your body by suddenly twisting it
to damage a joint in your body by suddenly twisting it
to damage a joint in your body by suddenly twisting it
